concept.title: Placing a call code
concept.shortdesc: The code below illustrates the example shown.

section.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <!DOCTYPE task PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DITA Task//EN" "task.dtd"> <task xml:lang="en-us" id="placingcall"> <title>Placing a call</title> <taskbody> <steps> <step conref="ReusableSteps.dita#reusablesteps/lifthandset"> <cmd/> </step> <step> <cmd>Dial the number.</cmd> </step> </steps> </taskbody> </task>
